column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Submit a Service Request on ActiveBuilding

#Text=If your apartment home utilizes ActiveBuilding to manage service requests , submitting requests online is one of the easiest , and most convenient ways to submit service requests directly to the maintenance staff , as ActiveBuilding allows you to submit service requests directly to maintenance personnel 24/7 .
#Text=The instruction set will also show you how to grant access to your apartment so the maintenance personnel can enter the unit .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Creating Your ActiveBuilding Account
#Text=Register with your apartment building .
#Text=The email listed on your application will also be the email used to login to the ActiveBuilding service .
#Text=You may either go to activebuilding.com , or access the website through the resident portal on your apartment building 's website .
#Text=Create an ActiveBuilding password .
#Text=Make sure you record this password , as you will use it every time you log on .
#Text=Creating the Service Request
#Text=Click the tab labeled ' Submit a Request . '
#Text=This tab is located on the left-hand side of the screen under the section “ Quick Links . ”
#Text=This tab will take you to the service requests page .
#Text=Click on the ' Submit a Service Request ' link .
#Text=At the top of the screen you will see two options .

#Text=One link says ' Current Service Requests ' , and another reads ' Submit a Service Request . ' Click on either of the links that say ' Submit a Service Request ' and you will be taken to the service request submission form .
#Text=Fill out and respond to the questions on the form .
#Text=You will be asked a series of questions about your maintenance issue .
#Text=Respond truthfully and accurately .
#Text=Try to be as descriptive as possible in order to ensure the highest quality attention to your issue .
#Text=The questions you will be asked include :
#Text=What type of problem are you having ?
#Text=Please select the appropriate category for your issue from the drop-down menu .
#Text=For example , if your heat is not working please select ' Heating and Cooling ' .
#Text=Location
#Text=.
#Text=Indicate which room(s) in your apartment is/are affected .
#Text=What is causing the issue ?
#Text=What specific piece of equipment , appliance , or other component of your apartment is dysfunctional .
#Text=If you are not sure of what is causing the issue , please select ' other ' .
#Text=What is the issue ?
#Text=Please indicate your issue by selecting the closest choice on the drop-down menu .
#Text=These answers are generated based on your answers to the previous questions .
#Text=The options on the menu are common issues found relating to the category your previously selected .
#Text=If you do n't see your specific problem listed , please select ' Other - please see comments .
#Text='
#Text=If you select this option , type an accurate , detailed report of your issue in the box provided .
#Text=Granting Access to Your Apartment
#Text=Grant access .
#Text=Underneath the report you filled out about your maintenance issue , you will see your contact information , followed by a series of questions .
#Text=The first asks when maintenance staff has your permission to enter .
#Text=You may either click ' At anytime ' or ' By appointment only . '
#Text=If you select ' By appointment only ' you will then be prompted to enter a time and day for your appointment .
#Text=Enter pet information and alarm codes .
#Text=You will be asked if your pet information has changed .
#Text=This is to ensure that maintenance personnel can service your apartment using pet-friendly methods .
#Text=In some instances , you may be required to remove your pet from the unit before , during , or after maintenance .
#Text=Submit any changes to your alarm code so maintenance staff can access the unit .
#Text=Leave entry notes and submit .
#Text=If there is anything you would like the maintenance staff to know before entering your unit , leave a message in the entry notes comment box .
#Text=After you are done with this final step , you may submit the form and it will be delivered to the maintenance staff immediately .

#Text=Maintenance technicians will also be notified of any emergency service requests , such as an overflowing toilet , issues with door locks , or any other service requests that require immediate attention .
#Text=Tips
#Text=You will receive an email notification after your request has been received .
#Text=If you did not receive an email notification , speak to the office staff to ensure that your request was received .
#Text=After you have submitted the request , your service request will be accessible under the ' Current Service Requests ' tab .
